title: Question about the LeaverBuster
body:
I've missed 2 games recently, first was a LoL bugsplat, client had to be repaired and by the time I got back in, the game was remade.

Second was internet issues with my ISP.

I don't mind being punished, as Rito doesn't know if it was intentional leaving or not. Fair enough.

But looking at the leaverbuster FAQ, it says it starts off at a 5 min waiting time, then 10 mins then 20 mins.

My question is, after say hitting the 5 & 10 min waiting times, is it always 20 mins every punishment after?

Not moaning if it is, I'm just wondering. 

I don't remember getting previous LeaverBuster punishments (never once rage quitted) but I have played for years so my memory might just be foggy.

replies.body: If you play enough games without getting flagged as a leaver, the length of the LPQ should be lowered back down to 10 and then 5. It's not based on a certain amount of time, but rather how many games you've played without going afk/leaving.
